dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
Biobb_model is the Biobb module collection to check and model 3d
structures, create mutations or reconstruct missing atoms
dependent_to.name: py-biobb-model

dependent_to.description:
The py-motmetrics library provides a Python implementation of metrics
for benchmarking multiple object trackers (MOT).
dependent_to.name: py-motmetrics

dependent_to.description: Convenient reader for Matlab mat files.
dependent_to.name: py-pymatreader

dependent_to.description:
A dict subclass with keylist/keypath support, I/O shortcuts and many
utilities.
dependent_to.name: py-python-benedict

dependent_to.description:
wradlib is designed to assist you in the most important steps of
processing weather radar data. These may include: reading common data
formats, georeferencing, converting reflectivity to rainfall intensity,
identifying and correcting typical error sources (such as clutter or
attenuation) and visualising the data.
dependent_to.name: py-wradlib

dependent_to.description: yq takes YAML input, converts it to JSON, and pipes it to jq
dependent_to.name: py-yq

description:
xmltodict is a Python module that makes working with XML feel like you
are working with JSON.
name: py-xmltodict

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
